para.heading: Delta Council; access to state-of-the-art educational technology; and workforce preparation initiatives. —
para.text: There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out subsections (a), (b), and (d) of § 38-1806.04, $1,000,000 for each of the fiscal years 1997, 1998, and 1999.

para.heading: Deal Center. —
para.text: There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out § 38-1806.04(c), $2,000,000 for each of the fiscal years 1997, 1998, and 1999.

para.heading: Jobs for D.C. Graduates Program. —
para.text: There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out § 38-1806.07:
$3,000,000 for each of the fiscal years 1998 through 2001.

para.heading: Availability. —
para.text: Amounts authorized to be appropriated under subsection (a) are authorized to remain available until expended.
